page.title: 10STUDLEY GREEN GARDEN CENTRE.
page.content:
STUDLEY GREEN GARDEN & LEISURE CENTRE
Since about 1975 garden centres have grown a lot,reflecting greater variety in plants available & more money spent on gardens.10 yrs.ago this centre began in a hut(now an antique shop) & is still expanding,with gardening, camping & swimming pool sales. {Gardening}-May is busiest month,Sunday busiest day.4 full-time employees are helped by 3 teenagers at weekends. Advice is given eg.azaleas hate local chalk.A wide variety of garden goods & greenhouses are sold. {Camping}-about 30 tents are on display each year;biggest seller is a family frame tent at Â£393.Trailer tents have been very popular lately.3 employees sell camping goods in a crowded shop, busiest at weekends in June & July.
